item.title: Juliette add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Juliette add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Juliette add a quote by Francesca Lia Block
item.description: "A kiss about apple pie a la mode with the vanilla creaminess melting in the pie heat. A kiss about chocolate, when you haven't eaten chocolate in a year. A kiss about palm trees speeding by, trailing pink clouds when you drive down the Strip sizzling with champagne. A kiss about spotlights fanning the sky and the swollen sea spilling like tears all over your legs." -- Francesca Lia Block

item.title: Juliette add a quote by Gillian Flynn
item.description: "I was not a lovable child, and I'd grown into a deeply unlovable adult. Draw a picture of my soul, and it'd be a scribble with fangs." -- Gillian Flynn

item.title: Juliette add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "Trying to build myself up with the fact that I have done things right that were even good and have had moments that were excellent but the bad is heavier to carry around and feel have no confidence." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Juliette add a quote by Dudley Moore
item.description: "Not everyone who drinks is a poet. Some of us drink because we're not poets." -- Dudley Moore
